vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Ezr.2.3
§ Parosh or Pharosh = "flea"
1) ancestor of a family who returned from exile with Zerubbabel and a 2nd group who returned with Ezra
2) a leader of the people who signed the covenant with Nehemiah
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (1)   pulga ; (2)   jefe de familia; post exílico
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
巴錄 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "跳蚤"
1) 人名, 其後裔有一批隨所羅巴伯回歸(拉 2:3), 另一批隨以斯拉回歸(拉 8:3)
2) 一位在和尼希米所訂的公約上簽名的民的領袖
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
巴录 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "跳蚤"
1) 人名, 其后裔有一批随所罗巴伯回归(拉 2:3), 另一批随以斯拉回归(拉 8:3)
2) 一位在和尼希米所订的公约上签名的民的领袖

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Ezr.8.3
§ Parosh or Pharosh = "flea"
1) ancestor of a family who returned from exile with Zerubbabel and a 2nd group who returned with Ezra
2) a leader of the people who signed the covenant with Nehemiah

2) a leader of the people who signed the covenant with Nehemiah
